p: The mortality levels obtained in the dose-mortality bioassays were satisfactorily described by the probit model [goodness-of-fit tests exhibiting low Ï‡ 2-values (<10) and high P-values (>0.05)]. The toxicity ratios (TR) were estimated relative to the LD 50 for deltamethrin. The toxicities of the clove and cinnamon essential oils were similar to the pyrethroid-based insecticide deltamethrin ( Table 2).
